nodes.text: Nar Kaaga was an astronomical object located in the Hutt Space region of the galaxy. It was connected to fellow Hutt Space world Circumtore and the Bothan Space planet[source?] Bothawui by hyperspace routes. Nar Kaaga was located at galactic coordinates S-13.

At some point after the events of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, bounty hunter Beilert Valance was in the H'unn Cabaret Pit on Nar Kaaga, meeting with Syphacc to hear about a new job. In reality, this was a hit on Valance by Tasu Leech. After a quick fight, Valance made his way out of the Cabaret Pit and to the Broken Wing in Docking Bay 27-A, where he received a call from Rebel Alliance Lieutenant Kondra asking for his help in the Terminus.

Nar Kaaga was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. The world originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
